gold.name: Gold Pieces
gold.flavor: The common currency of the world.

torch.name: Torch
torch.flavor: Used for lighting up even the darkest of areas.

bandage.name: Bandage
bandage.flavor: Good for patching up some scrapes.

small_meal.name: Small Meal
small_meal.flavor: Good for recovering a bit of stamina.

potion_healing.name: Potion of Healing
potion_healing.flavor: Good for healing up some light injuries.

rules.description: May _Use_ to trap an _entrance_ to your current location. The first enemy that enters through must pass an Agility(15) test or suffer 1d4 damage.

handaxe.name: Handaxe
handaxe.flavor: A straight-bladed double-edged sword large enough to require the use of two hands to wield it effectively.

greatsword.name: Greatsword
greatsword.flavor: A straight-bladed double-edged sword large enough to require the use of two hands to wield it effectively.

heavy_crossbow.name: Heavy Crossbow
heavy_crossbow.flavor: A straight-bladed double-edged sword large enough to require the use of two hands to wield it effectively.

shortbow.name: Shortbow
shortbow.flavor: A small bow that has a strong tension, and is usually about a meter tall.

short_sword.name: Short Sword
short_sword.flavor: A sword generally shorter than one meter, but longer than a dagger.

spell_fireball.name: Spell: Fireball
spell_fireball.flavor: A book containing the incantations necessary to hurl a ball of fire at your enemies.

song_charm.name: Song: Charm
song_charm.flavor: A book of musical instructions for playing a charm song.

cloth_armor.name: Cloth Armor
cloth_armor.flavor: A basic cloth outfit, mostly for decorative purposes.

padded_armor.name: Padded Armor
padded_armor.flavor: A padded vest, for the minimal protection against attacks.

small_backpack.name: Small Backpack
small_backpack.flavor: A small backpack for carrying things.

large_backpack.name: Large Backpack
large_backpack.flavor: A heavy backpack for carrying many things.

hide_armor.name: Hide Armor
hide_armor.flavor: Boiled or dried hide that still allows for some maneuvering.

iron_armor.name: Plate Armor
iron_armor.flavor: Forged iron armor, good for blocking a lot of strikes.
